data.title: DWR awards $29 million to underrepresented communities and Tribes for drought relief
data.excerpt: The Department of Water Resources (DWR) today announced $29 million in funding for 44 drought relief projects to improve water supply reliability, address drinking water quality, and support water conservation primarily serving underrepresented and Tribal communities.
data.author: Kalin Kipling
